channel.title: [LightRune] Fletching
channel.description:
I just started with using LightRune, and decided to create the Fletching skill.
So, let's start.
Add the following classes to: org.game.content.skill.fletching
ArrowCreating.java
Code: [url=http://pastebin.com/qbEkYD9U]http://pastebin.com/qbEkYD9U[/url]
Cutting.java
Code: [url=http://pastebin.com/z8i2h3VX]http://pastebin.com/z8i2h3VX[/url]
CuttingInterface.java
Code: [url=http://pastebin.com/2YVpNbxJ]http://pastebin.com/2YVpNbxJ[/url]
Stringing.java
Code: [url=http://pastebin.com/UaJNXv09]http://pastebin.com/UaJNXv09[/url]
Next, in the package: org.game.content.skill
Create the class:
[CODE] SkillMenus.java [/CODE]
Add: http://pastebin.com/70igiNYz
Now, in ButtonPacketHandler.java add: [CODE] CuttingInterface.handleButtons(player, buttonIndex); [/CODE]
import: [CODE] import org.game.content.skill.fletching.CuttingInterface; [/CODE]
In MovementPacketHandler.java add: [CODE] player.isFletching = false; player.cutAmount = 0; [/CODE]
In UseItemPacketHandler.java add: [CODE] ArrowCreating.createArrow(player, itemUsedId, usedWithId); [/CODE]
and: [CODE] if(itemUsedId == 1777 || usedWithId == 1777) { Stringing.stringBow(player, itemUsedId == 1777 ? usedWithId : itemUsedId); } if(itemUsedId == 946 || usedWithId == 946) { CuttingInterface.itemOnItem(player, itemUsedId == 946 ? usedWithId : itemUsedId); } [/CODE]
Import: [CODE] import org.game.content.skill.fletching.ArrowCreating; import org.game.content.skill.fletching.CuttingInterface; import org.game.content.skill.fletching.Stringing; [/CODE]
In Player.java add: [CODE] public int cutAmount; public boolean isFletching; public int fletchLog; [/CODE]
Enjoy.

@enzo42 wrote:

I just started with using LightRune, and decided to create the Fletching skill.

So, let’s start.

Add the following classes to:
org.game.content.skill.fletching

ArrowCreating.java

Code: http://pastebin.com/qbEkYD9U

Cutting.java

Code: http://pastebin.com/z8i2h3VX

CuttingInterface.java

Code: http://pastebin.com/2YVpNbxJ

Stringing.java

Code: http://pastebin.com/UaJNXv09

Next, in the package:
org.game.content.skill

Create the class:

SkillMenus.java

Add: http://pastebin.com/70igiNYz

Now, in ButtonPacketHandler.java
add:

CuttingInterface.handleButtons(player, buttonIndex);

import:

import org.game.content.skill.fletching.CuttingInterface;

In MovementPacketHandler.java
add:

  player.isFletching = false;
  player.cutAmount = 0;

In UseItemPacketHandler.java
add:

ArrowCreating.createArrow(player, itemUsedId, usedWithId);

and:

  if(itemUsedId == 1777 || usedWithId == 1777) {
   Stringing.stringBow(player, itemUsedId == 1777 ? usedWithId : itemUsedId);

  if(itemUsedId == 946 || usedWithId == 946) {
   CuttingInterface.itemOnItem(player, itemUsedId == 946 ? usedWithId : itemUsedId);

import org.game.content.skill.fletching.CuttingInterface;
